name: Dumbgeon
description:
A game made by Anthony Tran Nguyen

The game includes combat, platforming, a shop upgrading system, and four unique enemies, and a final boss.

Controls

Use Arrow Keys to move

Up Arrow Key to jump

Hold the Up Arrow Key to Jump Higher

Hold the Down Arrow Key to Sit

C - Attack

X - Block

Z - Interact (With Shop or Lever)

Left Shift - Dodge
